pages.text: Just because you've slapped a lock on one of your belongings doesn't mean that it is safe from prying fingers. Rogueish-types have been known to use lockpicks to gain entry to what iron has failed to protect. If you find that your belongings are no longer protected by a lock, your possessions have been rummaged through.
This guide is not going to educate one how to perform such illicit activities. If you'd like to know how to protect against thievery, keep reading on...
